prodNameC: 亞培臨床生化運鐵蛋白檢驗試劑組
ingredientsDesc:
Contains:
Reagent 1(R1) 5 x 20 mL
Reagent 2(R2) 5 x 9 mL
Estimated tests per kit are 391. Calculation is based on the minimum reagent fill volume per kit .
Reactive Ingredients:
Ingredient                              Concentration
R1 : TRIS                              100 mmol/L
Polyethylene Glycol                  45 g/L
Sodium Azide                       0.1%
R2 : Anti-human transferring goat serum      40%
TRIS                              100 mmol/L
Sodium Azide                       0.1%
applicantName: 美商亞培股份有限公司台灣分公司
applicantAddr: 台北市中山區民生東路三段49號5樓、6樓及51號6樓
efficacy: 定量測試人類血清或血漿中運鐵蛋白(transferrin)的濃度。需搭配ARCHITECT c (c8000，c4000，c16000) 系統及AEROSET系統使用。
